DOC.brief_summary: To compare the treatment methods of endoscopic submucosal dissection (ESD) and endoscopic mucosal band ligation (EMBL) for early cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Submucosal Dissection (ESD) and Endoscopic Mucosal Band Ligation (EMBL) for Early Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients with early neoplasm in the gastrointestinal tract Patients who can not meet the surgery
